content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --RESCAT
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --STRESC
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000101
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --RESCAT is not empty, but --STRESC is empty
Outcome:
  Message: Missing --STRESC value, when --RESCAT value is populated.
  Output Variables:
    - --RESCAT
    - --STRESC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0427
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: A grouping or classification of the results of an
                  assessment. The result is in --STRESC.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --RESCAT
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --RESCAT is not empty, but --STRESC is empty

Outcome.Message: Missing --STRESC value, when --RESCAT value is populated.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: A grouping or classification of the results of an assessment. The result is in --STRESC.
